prev.title: Top 13 Open Source Database Software for Your Next Project
prev.summary: Open source databases offer flexibility, scalability, and cost savings. They provide robust features for managing data, including relational and non-relational options, plus community of developers that contribute to their ongoing development and support. Here are some top open source databases to consider
